'''Stabilizers''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Fontaine]] currently found in the [[Liffey Region]] and [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]].

Some stabliziers may be unusable until a [[Fixed Storage Device]] or [[Energy Transfer Device]] containing energy activates them.
